summary: Encapsulates AWS RouteÂ 53 DNS management, offering operations to create, retrieve, update, and delete hosted zones, health checks, VPC associations, query logging configurations, reusable delegation sets, and resource tags, while handling validation and conflict checks.
business_intent: Enable automated, programmatic control of DNS resources in AWS for infrastructure provisioning, configuration, and lifecycle management, supporting DevOps and IaC pipelines.
